column2: Perform spell to become an immortal!
Deactivates current spell and increases all base stats depending on arcane level
Heals various traits depending on arcane level
Deactivates current spell and allows player to cast a plague on another character
Deactivates current spell and increases local tax revenue based on arcane level
Deactivates current spell and allows the player to switch titles with another character
Summons troops while at war depending on arcane level. Earth mages summon an additional 500 heavy troops. This spell has a 2-year cooldown.
Open up your spellbook to perform a list of spells
